title: Cannot Specify Desired Hand Model for Dual-Hand Control

content.raw: I am trying to control right and left MPLs simultaneously through Octave for a dual-hand simulation. However, I cannot specify which hand model to control, and it seems like the hand manipulated changes randomly at every restart of the simulation even though I specify an arm model while connecting the simulation from Octave via hx_connect, e.g., hx_connect('mpl_haptix_x_forearm').
